name: Candy Fight
description:
YOU NEED TO PLAY THIS GAME IN FULLSCREEN,OTHERWISE IT WILL NOT WORK. THIS GAME DOESN'T WORK ON FIREFOX

Welcome to CANDY FIGHT

In this game you need to keep your tooth alive and clean! "How will i do that?" you might ask. Well,you need to TAKE A GUN AND KILL ALL THE CANDY THAT WANT TO DESTROY YOUR TOOTH! And then you need to...BUILD TURRETS THAT HELP YOU IN KILLING CANDY AND DEFENDING THE TOOTH.

Controls:

You move with : WASD

You shoot with : YOUR MOUSE

You change your selected item (top-left) with : YOUR SCROLLWHEEL

Credits:

TheMonvster

Song: "Hazard" by Spiff Tune

Cody Shepp

Powered by Phaser
